<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/resources/call_flows/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a Call Flow by ID.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The ID of the Call Flow","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"993ed018-9e79-4e50-b97b-984bd5534095"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","example":"Booking Assistant","description":"The name of the Call Flow"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"document_version":{"type":"integer","example":2,"description":"The current revision of the call flow. Every update must increase this number."}}}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A Call Flow","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"993ed018-9e79-4e50-b97b-984bd5534095"},"project_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"1313fe58-5e14-4c11-bbe7-6fdfa11fe780"},"display_name":{"type":"string","example":"Booking Assistant"},"type":{"type":"string","example":"call_flow"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-01-02T00:00:00Z"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-01-02T00:00:00Z"},"call_flow":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"A unique identifier for the Call Flow"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","example":"Booking Assistant","description":"The name of the Call Flow"}}},{"type":"object","properties":{"flow_data":{"type":"string","example":"{}"},"relayml":{"type":"string","description":"A SWML document. Every update must increase this number."}}}]}}}}}},"422":{"description":"Unprocessable Entity","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string"},"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"attribute":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}},"required":["type","code","message","url"],"example":{"type":"validation_error","code":"invalid_parameter","message":"Name must be present","attribute":"name","url":"https://developer.signalwire.com/rest/signalwire-rest/overview/error-codes#invalid_parameter"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
